welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Antiguo Cuscatlan, a charming city known for its beautiful colonial architecture and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal is mainly used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal is used for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
